member.name: T:LiquidNun.Entities.EventLogEntryType
member.summary: Enumerates the types of Event Log Entries available to the logging system.

member.name: F:LiquidNun.Entities.EventLogEntryType.Information
member.summary: Identifies a log entry as informational only.

member.name: F:LiquidNun.Entities.EventLogEntryType.Warning
member.summary: Identifies a log entry as resulting from a warning event.

member.name: F:LiquidNun.Entities.EventLogEntryType.Error
member.summary: Identifies a log entry as resulting from an application error event.

member.name: F:LiquidNun.Entities.EventLogEntryType.Crash
member.summary: Identifies a log entry as resulting from an application crash event.

member.name: T:LiquidNun.Entities.LoggingProviderBase
member.summary: An abstract base class used to help implement logging providers.

member.name: M:LiquidNun.Entities.LoggingProviderBase.Write(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Int32,LiquidNun.Entities.EventLogEntryType)
member.summary: A method that needs to be exposed by the provider to write the log entry to the underlying data store.
member.param: The application specific category of the log entry.
The title for the log entry. This is usually the 1st thing that will be seen when entries are reviewed.
The full text of the message sent to the logging provider.
An indication of how critical an event the entry represents.
The type of entry as described in the EventLogEntryType enumeration.

member.name: M:LiquidNun.Entities.LoggingProviderBase.LogCrash(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary: Calls the write method with the appropriate parameters to create a log entry representing a crash event.
member.param: The application specific category of the log entry.
The title for the log entry. This is usually the 1st thing that will be seen when entries are reviewed.
The formatting template for the text of the message.
The parameters to be applied to the messageFormat template.
